name: ArcticSurvival
0:
”Alexa open Arctic Survival”
”Alexa ask Arctic Survival to start a new game”
”Alexa, ask Arctic Survival to continue my game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: arctic survival
des:
Arctic Survival is a choice-based game where you lead the survivors of a plane crash through the arctic. Manage morale, make critical decisions, and navigate the harsh arctic environment to ensure your group's survival. Every choice you make will determine the fate of your group. Are you ready to lead?

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Arctic Survival
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
